alert.note: Alert for McKinley; San Juan (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 04 at 4:02PM MST until March 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: CCA The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Northern McKinley County in west central New Mexico... Central San Juan County in northwestern New Mexico... * Until 500 PM MST. * At 404 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Farmington to 11 miles north of Lake Valley, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Highway 550 between Mile Markers 125 and 166. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 35 and 69. Locations impacted include... Farmington, Kirtland, Bloomfield, Aztec, NAPI Headquarters, Fruitland, Upper Fruitland, Lake Valley, Ojo Amarillo and El Huerfano Trading Post. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
